name: Zombie Road Survivor
description:
Zombie Road Survivor is best timeless racing game with trilling action of zombie shooting. Town is infected and it is turning into apocalyptic town. Stay calm and run for your life. Use your brain and skills to survive as long as you can. Start engine of your vehicle and drive as long as you can. But how far you can go? Zombies will not let you go anywhere. Drive fast and use your guns to kill zombies as much as you can otherwise walking dead will bite you and you will become one of them.


Game Features:
- Best 3D Graphics
- Different Cars
- Ammunition i.e., Machine Guns, Rifles etc
- Zombies (Walking Dead)
- Best Apocalyptic Game Environment
- Awesome Game Play


Game Controls:

Tilt:
Tilt to avoid obstacles and to smash walking dead in obstacles to kill them.

On Screen Tap:
Tap to shoot zombies with armors like machine gun, rifles and guns.

Unlock Ammunition:
Kill zombies on the run as many as you can. Earn cash on every kill. Unlock new ammunition to upgrade your vehicle and shoot zombies to survive as long as you can.

You have cars to smash zombies and you have guns to shoot zombies down, what else you want to stay alive and to survive in this apocalyptic town.


For more suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at gamesclanstudio@gmail.com
